description: First to purchase a product from an IGA
First to consume some pineapple
First to enter a public library
First to locate apple weighing over 210g
First to locate a physical print item containing 420 in the text (e.g. a receipt or serial number)
First to photograph a car over $200k AUD retail value
First to take a picture of another players house
First to successfully get another player with any sort of two part joke such as updog
First to consume both a caffeinated and an alcoholic beverage
First to get exactly 4km away from Kings park DNA tower
First to find a rare creature worthy of approval from other players
First to physically break something
First to collect 22 blue M&Ms
First to plant a playing card on another player and have it stick until another player can verify it
First to email the other players an investment opportunity pitch
First to utilise Barbecue sauce
Last player to equip thongs pays the bank
Last player to wake up next pays the bank
Last player to visit a post office pays the bank
Last player to consume a green beverage pays the bank
Everyone creates a digital art piece. Worst submitted art piece pays the bank
10 chips to whoever majority of players agree to give chips to. If it fails all players lose 10 chips
Most bets lost in the next hangout
Majority of players must agree on a player to lose 10 chips if no consensus is reached all players lose 15 chips
penalty: -10 chips to the chosen player, or -15 chips to all players if no consensus is reached

description: The two poorest players form an alliance and will receive full payment of any bounties (positive or negative) won by either party in the team for the next 2 bounty rolls
Whoever is willing to pay the other players the most chips (cumulative) gets 25 chips. The payment doesn't have to be even between players
The dealer - the richest player gains a dealer token. At the end of the next meet whoever holds the token deals out 10 chips to all other players. Passing the token isn't accusable
The small blind - the poorest player gains a small blind token. At the end of the next meet whoever holds the token gains 20 chips from the bank. Stealing the token isn't accusable
The button. Winner gets 10 chips from the loser
Random colour of chips is selected to become counterfeit chips worth -1. Giving them to another player isn't an accusable event
Next 2 "bring most chips to a hangout" bonus paid by the bank are 3x the usual amount
Map rush! Claim points of interest around Perth to increase your points.
